mapper.select: select user_role.*,jdy_user.*,jdy_role.* from user_role left join jdy_user on jdy_user.user_id =user_role.user_id and jdy_user.delete_id=0 left join jdy_role on user_role.role_id = jdy_role.role_id and jdy_role.delete_id=0

select user_permission.* from user_permission left join user_role_permission on user_role_permission.permission_id = user_permission.permission_id and user_role_permission.delete_id=0 left join jdy_role on user_role_permission.role_id =jdy_role.role_id and jdy_role.delete_id=0
